title: Spaghetti Carbonara ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹
description: A classic Roman pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

steps.description: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Fry pancetta or guanciale until crispy.
Beat eggs with grated Parmesan or Pecorino cheese.
Drain the pasta, reserving some cooking water, then combine with pancetta.
Mix in the egg mixture, adding cooking water as needed to create a creamy sauce. Season with black pepper.

title: Sushi ðŸ‡¯ðŸ‡µ
description: A traditional Japanese dish of vinegared rice accompanied by raw fish, vegetables, or other ingredients.

steps.description: Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar, sugar, and salt.
Slice fresh fish like tuna or salmon thinly.
Lay out a seaweed sheet and spread a thin layer of rice over it.
Add fillings such as fish, avocado, or cucumber.
Roll it up tightly and slice into bite-sized pieces. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Paella ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸
description: A saffron-flavored rice dish traditionally made with seafood, chicken, and vegetables.

steps.description: Saute onions, garlic, and bell peppers in olive oil.
Add chicken and/or seafood (shrimp, mussels, etc.).
Stir in rice and saffron threads, then pour in broth.
Simmer until the rice absorbs the liquid.
Garnish with fresh parsley and lemon wedges.

title: Peking Duck ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡³
description: A famous Chinese dish featuring crispy roasted duck served with pancakes and hoisin sauce.

steps.description: Marinate the duck with Chinese five-spice powder, soy sauce, and honey.
Dry the duck for several hours to achieve a crispy skin.
Roast the duck in a hot oven until the skin turns golden and crisp.
Slice thin pieces of duck, including both meat and skin.
Serve with thin pancakes, hoisin sauce, and sliced cucumbers and scallions.

title: Butter Chicken ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³
description: A rich and creamy curry made with marinated chicken cooked in a tomato-based sauce.

steps.description: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices (cumin, garam masala, turmeric).
Grill or saute the chicken until cooked.
In a separate pan, cook onions, tomatoes, and spices, then blend into a smooth sauce.
Add butter, cream, and cooked chicken to the sauce.
Simmer and serve with naan or basmati rice.

title: Beef Bourguignon ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡·
description: A slow-cooked beef stew made with red wine, mushrooms, onions, and bacon.

steps.description: Brown beef cubes in a large pot with olive oil.
Saute onions, carrots, and garlic in the same pot.
Add red wine, beef stock, and herbs (bay leaf, thyme).
Simmer for 2-3 hours until the beef is tender.
Add mushrooms and bacon in the final 30 minutes of cooking.

title: Tacos ðŸ‡²ðŸ‡½
description: Corn or wheat tortillas filled with a variety of ingredients like meat, cheese, beans, and salsa.

steps.description: Cook seasoned ground beef, chicken, or pork with spices like cumin and chili powder.
Warm soft tortillas or crisp them on a skillet.
Fill tortillas with cooked meat, shredded lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
Top with sour cream, avocado, or cilantro.
Serve immediately with lime wedges.

title: Pad Thai ðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡­
description: A stir-fried noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, eggs, and peanuts, seasoned with tamarind sauce.

steps.description: Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft.
Stir-fry shrimp or tofu in a hot wok with garlic and shallots.
Add beaten eggs, then scramble them in the wok.
Stir in noodles, tamarind paste, fish sauce, and palm sugar.
Top with crushed peanuts, bean sprouts, and lime wedges.

title: Moussaka ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡·
description: A layered casserole made with eggplant, minced meat, and bechamel sauce.

steps.description: Fry slices of eggplant until soft and golden.
Cook ground lamb or beef with onions, garlic, and tomatoes.
Layer the eggplant and meat mixture in a baking dish.
Prepare a bechamel sauce (butter, flour, milk) and pour it over the top.
Bake until golden and bubbly, then let it rest before serving.

title: Clam Chowder ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸
description: A creamy soup made with clams, potatoes, onions, and bacon.

steps.description: Saute bacon, onions, and celery in a pot until soft.
Add diced potatoes and clam juice, then simmer until potatoes are tender.
Stir in clams and cream, and heat gently without boiling.
Season with salt, pepper, and thyme.
Serve with oyster crackers or crusty bread.
